summary: Create Arrows at the forge. Arrows require fletching feathers to create which can be created and are also sold by all reputable and not so reputable blacksmith and general goods stores across the lands.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FFA500][b][size=\"5\"]Fletching Mod - Craftable Arrows V1.0[/size][/b][/color]

Create Arrows at the forge. Arrows require fletching feathers to create which are sold by all reputable and not so reputable blacksmith and general goods stores across the lands.

Fletching Feathers can also be created at the forge from Hagraven Feathers and Hawk Feathers. There isn\'t any crafting station that makes any sense to create these at currently so until then, they will remain at the forge.

Arrows are generally crafted in packs of 20 and to craft the higher grade arrows requires the relevant perks in the Smithing tree open them up. Three variations of the file are available. Standard, Easier and Hard. Their recipes are outlined below. The difficulty currently does not affect the fletching feather recipes or how many vendors stock.

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]Version 1.0 Changes[/b][/color][/size] 

Revised Daedric Arrow recipe
Forsworn Arrows Added
Quill added to Fletching Feather recipe
Added Featherless version

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]There are currently 4 versions of this file available.[/b][/color][/size] 

[b]Standard[/b]
Recipes can be found below

[b]Standard Featherless[/b]
This version removes the fletching feathers entirely.

[b]Double Yield[/b]
Doubles the yield on the standard recipes

[b]Harder[/b]
The original recipes. Arrows require more ingots to create than the standard variation. Recipes can be found below.

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]Fletching Feather Recipes[/b][/color][/size] 

[color=#FFA500][b]Fletching Feathers x4[/b][/color]
Quill x 1

[color=#FFA500][b]Fletching Feathers x8[/b][/color]
Hawk Feathers x 1

[color=#FFA500][b]Fletching Feathers x12[/b][/color]
Hagraven Feathers x 1

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]Standard Arrow Recipes[/b][/color][/size] 

[color=#FFA500][b]Iron Arrows[/b][/color]
Iron Ingot x 1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Forsworn Arrows (Requires Forsworn \"Completion of No One Escapes Cidhna Mine\")[/b][/color]
Iron Ingot x 1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Steel Arrows (Requires Steel Smithing)[/b][/color]
Steel Ingot x 1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Dwarven Arrows (Requires Dwarven Smithing)[/b][/color]
Dwarven Ingot x 1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Dwarven Arrows (Requires Dwarven Smithing & Completion of the quest \"Nimhe, the Poisoned One\" )[/b][/color]
Dwarven Ingot x 1
Fire Salts x 1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Elven Arrows (Requires Elven Smithing)[/b][/color]
Refined Moonstone x 1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Orcish Arrows (Requires Orcish Smithing)[/b][/color]

Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Glass Arrows (Requires Glass Smithing)[/b][/color]

Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Ebony Arrows (Requires Ebony Smithing)[/b][/color]
Ebony Ingot x 1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

[color=#FFA500][b]Daedric Arrows (Requires Daedric Smithing)[/b][/color]
Ebony Ingot x 1
Daedra Heart x1
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][color=#FFA500][b]Harder Arrow Recipes[/b][/color][/size] 

[color=#FFA500][b]Iron Arrows[/b][/color]
Iron Ingot x 2
Firewood x 2
Fletching Feather x 4

====================================================================================================================================

[size=\"3\"][b]Installation Guide[/b][/size]
Unzip the file and extract it to your data folder.

====================================================================================================================================
